hasDitaContent.@value: Etodolac causes bleeding, as can trastuzumab emtansine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Etodolac   causes   bleeding, as can   trastuzumab emtansine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both etodolac and treprostinil can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  etodolac  and  treprostinil  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Etodolac increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Etodolac   increases   the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both etodolac and triamterene can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.
